
更新学生密码密码的数据库语言 pwd123456
UPDATE `tbl_student`
set stu_pwd=0x3561323238633936613635626133383336333263316565313536656634646433
WHERE stu_no='2016110312'

WHERE stu_no='2017080323'

set tea_pwd=0x6233336530643935313362343866623636366263646561646166373465623830
WHERE tea_no='20011103'
